user.title: Settings for the pyduofern integration
user.description:
**Code**: This code must be chosen on first setup. It is a security feature - only someone knowing the code for your installation can talk to your devices. Chose a random string of four hex digits.

**Serial port:** Serial port of the Rademacher USB stick. All devices from ``/dev/serial/by-id/`` are offered for choice

**Config file:** If preexisting from older versions this allows to specify where an older config file may be found..

error.not_hex: The code must be four hexadecimal digits.
